Text: Enough with the cop shows for fucks sake.....its just a way to make the guy/gal firing the gun a good guy. ENOUGH!!!
Nearly thought not to read further after reading ^that comment. *sound of slapping myself in the face*. And one more after I leave for hating myself that MKULTRA got to me.
MKULTRA?  The CIA mind control experiments.  What is the relevancy there if you dont mind my asking.
Who cares about all that when there is an idiot who writes "tenks" on every damn torrent!
I guess it is nice that they are trying to convey gratitude, but to misspell the word kind of ruins the joy in it.
Useitright: Pity your handle doesn't match your actions.  If you don't like Cops shows then don't down load them.  Other people do like them.  Go stand in front of the mirror and whinge .. wanker!

Thank you :) Unlike some of the other people commenting I only d/l programmes I like to watch, and am very grateful that PB gives me this chance. Also, I would complain about  someone using foul language on here rather than someone who misspelled a word, perhaps English isn't their first language.
